name: One-0-Down
description:
Harry is on a leisurely stroll through the woods when he suddenly stumbles across a white rift on the ground. He is very interested, but he may have looked too closely. His clumsiness gets the best of him and falls down the computerized void. Can you help Harry from falling to his potential doom?

Use the arrow keys to move left and right.

This game was made back in May 2017 for my Video Game Programming 11 Class.
Created within a week.
